name: Dai Pho Keywords Generator
author: Dai Pho team

sections.description:
Keyword generator for post follow title. Input keywords, separated by comma. Ex: add keyword to content, more word for content, include keyword to post,…
Plugin will search word in post title and list keywords match with that word.
Use shortcode [daipho_keywords] in post content or widget.
sections.installation:
The easy way:

  1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “Dai Pho Keywords Generator”
  3. Click “Install”

Or

  1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “Dai Pho Keywords Generator”
  3. Download to your disk
  4. Extract, you will see “daipho-keyword” directory
  5. Copy “daipho-keyword” directory to wordpress plugin directory

short_description: Generate keyword for post content, more word for content. If the content too short, use this plugin to add more keywords for content.
